item.description:
Showtime is 7, I will be at the theater by 6 and we will head in for seats at 6:30.

It is summer and opening weekend,  I strongly advise getting your tickets ahead of time! 

It will be showing upstairs so look for me at the tables by the windows at the top of the escalators.  If you get there before me, please snag a table.

If you miss the group before, we always gather outside the room the movie was shown to discuss the movie a bit, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count of those who are interested in heading out for something to eat/drink. 

Couldn't help it....loved he original series with Charleton Heston and always wished they would really explain how it all happened.   Well here is the prequel.  

Movie Details:

Release Date: August 5, 2011
Studio: 20th Century Fox
Director: Rupert Wyatt
Screenwriter: Amanda Silver, Rick Jaffa
Starring: James Franco, Freida Pinto, John Lithgow, Brian Cox, Tom Felton, David Oyelowo, Andy Serkis
Genre: Action, Adventure , Sci-Fi
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: ApesWillRise.com 

Plot Summary: A single act of both compassion and arrogance leads to a war unlike any other -- and to the "Rise of the Planet of the Apes ." The Oscar-winning visual effects team that brought to life the worlds of "Avatar" and "Lord of the Rings" is breaking new ground, creating a CGI ape that delivers a dramatic performance of unprecedented emotion and intelligence, and epic battles on which rest the upended destinies of man and primate.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator, if it is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
